alert.note: Alert for Lauderdale; Lawrence; Limestone (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 01 at 5:30PM CST until January 01 at 6:15PM CST by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lauderdale County in northwestern Alabama... Limestone County in north central Alabama... Northern Lawrence County in northwestern Alabama... * Until 615 PM CST. * At 530 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Town Creek, or 13 miles east of Muscle Shoals, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Athens, Rogersville, Ardmore, Town Creek, Lexington, Elkmont, Anderson, Lester, Good Springs and Cartwright. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for north central and northwestern Alabama...and Middle Tennessee. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 1000 PM CST for northeastern Alabama.
